abstract: Imerys of France has made a binding $340 million offer to buy the talc division of Rio Tinto, the giant mining company.
snippet: Imerys of France has made a binding $340 million offer to buy the talc division of Rio Tinto, the giant mining company.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto said on Wednesday that Imerys had made a binding $340 million offer to buy its talc division.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Gets $340 Million Bid for Talc Unit
